moves.12. O-O Rc8 13. Bxe6 Nc7: Black decides to sacrifice the exchange to deter the attack.
moves.14. Bxc8 Qxc8 15. Ngxe4: White is now actually ahead in material.
moves.19... h5 20. b4 h4 21. bxc5 h3 22. g3 bx: Setting a trap...Black wants to take on g3.
moves.28. Be3 Rg4 29. Nf2: ?? Hasty move. I was already aware of the need to prevent the sac on g3 but forgot when I logged on again. Otherwise, Black is lost.
